commands.help: View a list and description of all the commands
commands.list: View a list all of the factions on the server
commands.info: View info on a given faction
commands.map: View a map of the surrounding factions
commands.invites: View a list of all the invites to join factions
commands.join: Become a member of the given faction
commands.reject: Reject an invite from the given faction
commands.motd: View your faction's message of the day
commands.chat: Switch your chat so only members of your faction or allies can see your chat messages
commands.claim: Claim a chunk for your faction
commands.ally: Make a given faction an ally of your faction
commands.enemy: Make a given faction an enemy of your faction
commands.neutral: Make your relationship with a given faction neutral
commands.kick: Remove a given member from your faction
commands.invite: Invite a player to your faction
commands.uninvite: Remove an invite to a given player
commands.setmotd: Set your faction's message of the day
commands.sethome: Set the home location for your faction
commands.desc: Set the description of your faction
commands.promote: Promote a member of your faction to a higher rank
commands.demote: Demote a member of your faction to a lower rank
commands.setrank: Set the rank of a member of your faction
commands.setowner: Hand over ownership of your faction to another member

AdminCommands.help: View a list and description of all the admin commands
AdminCommands.setfaction: Forcefully become a member of the given faction
AdminCommands.home: Instantly teleport to your faction home, ignoring cooldowns
AdminCommands.claim: Forcefully claim a chunk for the given faction
AdminCommands.ally: Forcefully make a given faction an ally of your faction
AdminCommands.enemy: Forcefully make a given faction an enemy of another given faction
AdminCommands.neutral: Forcefully make a given faction's relationship with another given faction neutral
AdminCommands.kick: Remove a given member from the given faction faction
AdminCommands.invite: Invite a player to the given faction
AdminCommands.uninvite: Remove an invite to a given player from a given faction
AdminCommands.setmotd: Set the given faction's message of the day
AdminCommands.sethome: Set the home location for a given faction
AdminCommands.desc: Set the description of a given faction
AdminCommands.flag: Set or remove the given faction's flags
AdminCommands.promote: Promote a member of a given faction to a higher rank
AdminCommands.demote: Demote a member of a given faction to a lower rank
AdminCommands.setrank: Set the rank of a member of a given faction faction
AdminCommands.setowner: Set the owning member of a faction
AdminCommands.setpower: Sets the power of a given faction
AdminCommands.setmaxpower: Sets the max power of a given faction
